alert.note: Alert for Buckeye, Avondale; Central Phoenix; East Valley; Northwest Pinal County; South Mountain, Ahwatukee; Southeast Valley, Queen Creek (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 07 at 3:27PM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Maricopa and Pinal Counties through 400 PM MST... At 327 PM MST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near South Mountain Park, or 7 miles south of Laveen, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Chandler, Tempe, South Mountain Park, Tempe Marketplace, Arizona Mills Mall, Arizona State University, South Phoenix, Chandler Fashion Center Mall, Guadalupe, Firebird Lake, and Komatke. This includes the following highways... AZ Interstate 10 between mile markers 152 and 165. US Highway 60 between mile markers 173 and 177. AZ Route 202 near mile marker 9, and between mile markers 49 and 55. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Buckeye, Avondale; Central Phoenix; East Valley; Northwest Pinal County; South Mountain, Ahwatukee; Southeast Valley, Queen Creek
